Top 10最大软件公司 VS Top 10最佳软件公司 （2008年）

Dec 14, 2008 • alvachien

Top 10最大软件公司 (Search result via Google Engine; Currency: Million Dollar)：
Ranking Name Software Revenue Total Revenue
1 Microsoft 48,267 55,690
2 IBM 19,982 98,786
3 Oracle 14,964 19,123
4 SAP 10,600 14,977
5 HP 5,524 107,311
6 Symantec 5,312 5,635
7 CA 3,803 4,178
8 Nintendo 3,402 8,652
9 Electronic Arts 3,310 3,310
10 Adobe 3,052 3,192
Top 10最佳软件公司(由<CIO Insight>发布)
Ranking Name Score
1 Google 81%
2 Red Hat 75%
3 Citrix 73%
4 Adobe 72%
5 Novell 65%
6 SalesForce.com 62%
7 Microsoft 61%
8 Cognos 60%
9 Business Objects 59%
10 Oracle 57%
Note: Business Objects was bought by SAP with $6.79 Bn dollars.
